result.eng: You will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ga: beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.orig: beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.html: beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ tú ar an ċailín is áille ar doṁanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.

result.eng: Who is the girl with the big glasses?
result.ga: cé hí cailín na spéaclaí móra
result.orig: cé hí cailín na spéaclaí móra
result.html: cé hí cailín na spéaclaí móraWho is the girl with the big glasses?
result.ponchtml: cé hí cailín na spéaclaí móraWho is the girl with the big glasses?

result.html: cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.
result.ponchtml: cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.

result.html: is cailín deas íShe's a nice girl.
result.ponchtml: is cailín deas íShe's a nice girl.

result.html: níl ionat ach cailín beagYou're only a small girl.
result.ponchtml: níl ionat aċ cailín beagYou're only a small girl.

result.html: níl ionat ach girseach bheagYou're only a little girl.
result.ponchtml: níl ionat aċ girseaċ ḃeagYou're only a little girl.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.orig: scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.html: scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ponchtml: scéal faoi ċailín beag a ṫéann isteaċ sa ċoillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.orig: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.html: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ponchtml: sin rud naċ ḃfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.

result.eng: The girl has been abandoned by her lover.
result.ga: tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannán
result.orig: tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannán
result.html: tá an cailín tréigthe ag a leannánThe girl has been abandoned by her lover.
result.ponchtml: tá an cailín tréigṫe ag a leannánThe girl has been abandoned by her lover.

result.ga: abair le do thoil - le do thoil - maith an cailín
result.orig: abair le do thoil - le do thoil - maith an cailín
result.html: abair le do thoil - le do thoil - maith an cailínSay "please". - Please. - Good girl.
result.ponchtml: abair le do ṫoil - le do ṫoil - maiṫ an cailínSay "please". - Please. - Good girl.

result.ga: ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.orig: ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.html: ná bíodh eagla ort a chailínDon't be afraid, girl.
result.ponchtml: ná bíoḋ eagla ort a ċailínDon't be afraid, girl.

result.eng: What is it? A girl. {of newborn child}

result.eng: She was growing up to be a girl.
result.ga: bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.orig: bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.html: bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sí ag teannaḋ aníos ar a ḃeiṫ ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
